ValidationRule.description: User VN Name must be mandatory when Resolution Tool is VN PSE.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF(
( (INCLUDES(Resolution_Tool__c,'VN PSE')) || (INCLUDES(Resolution_Tool__c,'VN FSE')) )
&& (User_VN_Name__c = null && VN_Name__c = null ),true,false)
&& OR($RecordType.Name =='Technical Issue',$RecordType.DeveloperName =$Label.AeroCustomerSupportRecTypeName) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed as Duplicate') ) && $User.Id !='005300000042rPL' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Escalated To" must not be blank when Resolution Tool is VN PSE or VN FSE
